clickToRestore.description: Click to restore session '$name$' in new window
clickToRestore.message: Clicca per ripristinare la sessione '$name$' in una nuova finestra

confirmClose.description: Open this session and close current window(s)? (Cannot undo!)
confirmClose.message: Open this session and close current window(s)? (Cannot undo!)

confirmDeleteQuestion.description: Are you sure you want to remove this session?
confirmDeleteQuestion.message: Sei sicuro di voler rimuovere questa sessione?

contactUs2.description: Suggestions? Praise? Love? Visit us here!

contactUs3.description: Problems? Bugs? Visit us here as well. We often need screenshots and your OS/Chrome version.
contactUs3.message: Problemi? Difetti? Visitateciqua as well. We often need screenshots and your OS/Chrome version.

contactUs4.description: We welcome all constructive feedbacks in civilized languages. *wink*
contactUs4.message: Apprezziamo tutti i commenti costruttivii in un linguaggio civile. *wink*

copyright.description: Home | Blog | Twitter | Copyright 2010 Visibo Ltd. All rights reserved.
copyright.message: Pagina iniziale | Blog | Twitter | Copyright 2010 Visibo Ltd. All rights reserved.

description.description: Need simple session management? Several users on the same Chrome? FreshStart is a simple cross browser session manager.
description.message: Hai bisogno di una gestione semplice delle sessioni? Molti utenti sullo stesso Chrome? FreshStart è un semplice gestore di sessioni browser.

emptySession.description: No window is selected in this session
emptySession.message: No window is selected in this session

enterSessionName.description: Please enter the name of the session
enterSessionName.message: Please enter the name of the session

exportedSessionCopyTips.description: Ctrl+c or Cmd+c to copy your session
exportedSessionCopyTips.message: Ctrl+c o Cmd+c per copiare la tua sessione

middleClickTips.message: Suggerimento: come opzione predefinita FreshStart ripristina le tue sessioni in una nuova finestra. Per aprire una sessione nella finestra attuale, usa ctrl-clic (su Windows, Linux) o cmd-clic (su Mac).

minutes.description:
minutes.
Recommended: 5 minutes. Auto-saving too
frequently may slow down your machine.
minutes.message:
minutes.
Recommended: 5 minutes. Auto-saving too
frequently may slow down your machine.

optionsBackupPeriod.description: Saves all your windows and tabs every
optionsBackupPeriod.message: Salva ogni tua finestra e scheda

optionsBackupPeriodOutOfRange.description: Backup period cannot be shorter than 1 minute or larger than 999 minutes
optionsBackupPeriodOutOfRange.message: Il periodo di backup non può essere più corto di 1 minuto o più lungo di 999 minuti

optionsNewUserTips.description: New to FreshStart? Visit our Welcome Page!
optionsNewUserTips.message: Nuovo in FreshStart? Visita la nostra Pagina di Benvenuto!

restoreSession2.description: Click to open session in new window
restoreSession2.message: Clicca per aprire in una nuova finestra, ctrl-clic (Win, Linux) o cmd-clic (Mac) per aprire nella finestra corrente

saveFail.description: Fail to save session. Please try again later
saveFail.message: Fail to save session. Please try again later

saveSessionButtonDescription.description: Click here to save this as a new FreshStart session
saveSessionButtonDescription.message: Click here to save this as a new FreshStart session

sizeWarning.description: * If the size is too small, it may distort the layout.
sizeWarning.message: * If the size is too small, it may distort the layout.

smHeadingNewTitle.description: You can drag and drop tabs between windows
smHeadingNewTitle.message: You can drag and drop tabs between windows

smHeadingSaved.message: Schede Salvate (togli la spunta per rimuovere)

smSaveList.description: Uncheck tabs that you don't want to be saved.
smSaveList.message: Togli la spunta dalle schede che non vuoi che vengano salvate.

supportUs.description:
Support our development and
share to your friends!
supportUs.message:
Supporta il nostro sviluppo e
condiviti con gli amici!

updatedMessage.description: FreshStart is updated, click here to see what's new
updatedMessage.message: FreshStart è aggiornato, clicca qua per vedere cosa c’è di nuovo
